channel.title: math.SG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: On the Equivalence of Generalized Ricci Curvatures
item.description: arXiv:2406.06695v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We prove the equivalence between the several notions of generalized Ricci curvature found in the literature. As an application, we characterize when the total generalized Ricci tensor is symmetric.
item.dc:creator: Gil R. Cavalcanti, Jaime Pedregal, Roberto Rubio

item.title: Classification of nilpotent almost abelian Lie groups admitting left-invariant complex or symplectic structures
item.description: arXiv:2406.06819v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: We classify the nilpotent almost abelian Lie algebras admitting complex or symplectic structures. It turns out that if a nilpotent almost abelian Lie algebra admits a complex structure, then it necessarily admits a symplectic structure. Given an even dimensional almost abelian Lie algebra, we show that it always admits a complex structure when it is 2-step nilpotent and it always admits a symplectic structure when it is $k$-step nilpotent for $k=2, \, 3$ or $4$. Several consequences of the classification theorems are obtained.
item.dc:creator: Romina M. Arroyo, Mar\'ia L. Barberis, Ver\'onica S. Diaz, Yamile Godoy, Isabel Hern\'andez
